title: Development of Product List User Interface
description: Develop a user-friendly and visually appealing user interface for the product list of the online shop according to the specifications and designs.

subtask.description: Create the HTML markup for the product list according to the requirements
Develop CSS styles for the product list
Review the user interface for functionality and errors

title: Backend Development for Online Shop Core Functionalities - Database Setup
description: Set up the database schema for storing product information, user data, and order details.

title: Design Review for Product List
description: Review the provided designs for the product list and clarify any ambiguities with the design team.

title: Creation of Requirements Specification Document
description: Create a document outlining all functional and non-functional requirements of the system based on the gathered requirements.

subtask.description: Organize the requirements into structured sections for clarity and easy reference
Review the document for completeness and accuracy, making revisions as necessary based on feedback
